name: Prescribing of Amino acid formula (AAF) for Cow's Milk Protein Allergy (CMPA)
title: Amino acid formula (AAF) as proportion of AAF and extensively hydrolysed formula (EHF)
description: Prescribing of amino acid formula (AAF) products as proportion of AAF and extensively hydrolysed formula (EHF)
why_it_matters: EHF formula is appropriate for the majority (around 90%) of children with CMPA. Amino acid formula products are almost three
times more expensive than EHF and only a small number of infants (around 10%) need to be started on AAF in primary care.
